text: Lucille A. Hood (c. 1957 â€“ April 2, 2014), commonly known as Lucy Hood, was an American businesswoman. She was the founder of Fox Mobile Entertainment and the Executive Director of the Institute for Communication Technology Management (CTM) at the University of Southern California. Hood died of cancer in Los Angeles on April 2, 2014, at the age of 56.TV Academy President and COO Lucy Hood Dies - The Hollywood Reporter ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from California Category:American chief executives
title: Lucy Hood
